name: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater HD Edition
name_original: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater HD Edition
description:
Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater HD Edition is an action game developed by Kojima Productions and Armature Studio. It came out on 08-12-2011. It was published by Konami. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater HD Edition on PlayStation 3.
